data.name: ShadowProperties
desc: This is a set of properties to describe the style for rendering a shadow.

properties.name: Shadow
desc: enables/disables the shadow of a Shape.
The other shadow properties are only applied if this is set to TRUE.

properties.name: ShadowBlur
desc: This defines the degree of blur of the shadow in points.

properties.name: ShadowColor
desc: This is the color of the shadow of this Shape.

properties.name: ShadowTransparence
desc: This defines the degree of transparence of the shadow in percent.

properties.name: ShadowXDistance
desc: This is the horizontal distance of the left edge of the Shape to the shadow.

properties.name: ShadowYDistance
desc: This is the vertical distance of the top edge of the Shape to the shadow.
